petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused Kundan Nath has appeared with a Ptn vide 1152/19 praying for previous bail. Seen the Ptn. Bailor Tilak Nath has filed a ptn vide 1160/19 stating the he would continue as bailor of the accused.Seen the Ptn. Perused the case record.Considering all prayer for previous bail is accepted.Fixing 14-08-2019 for Copy and c/c
Accused is absent with steps vide ptn no. 1343/19. Due to absence of the accused copy could not be furnished. Fix 04-09-2019 for copy.

Accused Kundan Nath is present. Copy is furnished to the accused. Perused the case record. Heard both sides. It appears that there are sufficient materials u/s 8 of the protection of Children from several offence Act against the accused. Charge is framed u/s 8 of the POCSO Act against the accused. The charge is readover and explained to the accused to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried. Issue summon to all witnesses.Fixing 03-10-2019 for evidence.

Accused Kundan Nath is present. Witness namely Hemlata Devi, Kanika Nath, Moinul Hoque Mondanl and Moizur Rahman are present.By filing petition vide NO. 1917/19 engaged counsel of the accused prays to call for record of cross case record having GR No. 1695/19 PRC No. 593/19.Heard counsel for both sides. Perused case record. Considering all prayer is accepted.Accordingly call GR record from the court of Ld. SDJM (M), Bilasipara.Fixing 25-10-2019 for record.
Accused is present. Record call for reached in the court. Issue summon to all witnesses.Fixing 21-11-2019 for evidence.
Accused is present. Call for record reached the court. Seen the record. Send back the record.Fixing 27-01-2020 for evidence.

Accused Kundan Nath is present. Two witnesses namely Hemlata Debya and Kanika Nath are present. By filing ptn. vide No. 158/2020 engaged counsel of the accused prays for adjournment of the case today citing the reason that senior engaged counsel is not present. which is allowed with cost of Rs. 700/ each. Perused the case record. Considering all witnesses are allowed to go on PR bond with a cost of Rs. 700/ each with a direction to appear on next date. Also issue summon to other witnesses. Fixing 06-02-2020 for evidence.
Accused is present. Witness Hemlota Devi and Konika Nath are present, bot are examined, cross examined and discharged. Issue summon to all remaining witnesses. Fixing 17-02-2020 for evidence.
Accused is present. Witness Deeptjyoti Nath is present, he is examined and discharged. Issue summon to the remaining witnesses. Fixing 26-02-2020 for evidence.

Accused is present, Witness Moinul Hoque Mondal and Moizur Rahman are present, both are examined, cross examined and discharged. Issue summon to the remaining witnesses. Fixing 06-03-2020 for evidence.
Accused is present. No witness are present. Issue fresh summon to the witnesses. Fixing 16-03-2020 for evidence.

Accused is absent with steps vide ptn. 758/2020. Witness Amirul Hoque Mondal is present, he is examined,cross examined and discharged. Issue summon to the remaining witnesses.  Fixing 26-03-2020 for evidence.
Due to preventive measure to fight against the outbreak of the Novel Corona Virus Covid 19 case is adjourned today.
